title: Is it possible to get admitted to Harvard from Bangladesh? If yes, how do I? - Quora

response.answer_text: Is it possible to get admitted to Harvard from Bangladesh? If yes, how do I? YES, but you should be an exemplary holistic profile, as only about 1% of international students do get admitted. How do I take admission in Harvard University? will guide you further. It is unlikely that a student with just academic excellence may secure an admission at Harvard.

They have a web page on this topic International Applicants I’m not sure why I decided to look this up, myself. Curious, I guess. But being able to look this stuff up yourself is an important skill. If you can’t figure this type of thing out, you’re probably not Harvard material.
